ModMetaData.name: [Medieval]Dead Can Serve
ModMetaData.author: CapatinSnafu
ModMetaData.description:
A Medieval Version for My Mod [Dead Can Serve]. Have removed all the modern or advanced techs of the original mod and make a little adjustment. So medieval mod player can utilize corpse without something they can't use.
Imcompatible with [Dead Can Serve].
Things contain below:
CorpseFertilizer AntisepticCorpse PlanterCoffin Crucifix MaggotsBreeder LargeMaggots
Check the description and screenshots in the complete version. If you're not a medieval mod player, i recommend you to use the complete version.
